title: Display Driver Engineer
summary: Display Driver team with Graphics, GPU and Display organization is an exciting team that delivers software for industry leading display technologies for Mac, iPad, Apple TV, Phone and Watch. We are looking for an outstanding, driven, and dedicated engineer to join the team. The successful candidate will be a high- energy problem solver with a passion for excellence and a track record for getting the job done. We are looking for people who are excellent standout colleagues and who also work well on individual assignments.
description:
As a Display Technologies & Driver engineer, you will have responsibilities spanning all aspects of display driver including architecture, design, code development, debug and deployment
Own feature design, implementation, debug, and delivery of display technologies on Macs, iPad and Apple TV.
Participate in driving advances to display technologies, power-management, Color Management, HDR and other key Panel technologies.
Partner with Internal teams including Display Silicon team and external vendor teams in developing architecture for next generation of display pipeline for Apple SOCs for Mac, iPad, Apple TV and other interesting products.
Lead and carry forward highly complex software and hardware debug efforts.
Implement user facing critical features, perform complex troubleshooting of problems and defect resolution.
preferred_qualifications:
Experience with firmware development, and hardware simulators is a plus
Experience implementing device drivers for display devices is a plus
HW bring up and debugging is a plus
HDR, Color Management, video formats, power management, backlight, or content- protection technologies are a plus
